thread.title: Listen to Calvin Harris, Frank Ocean, and Migos "Slide" Into a New Collaboration
thread.title_full: Listen to Calvin Harris, Frank Ocean, and Migos "Slide" Into a New Collaboration | Complex

author: Shawn Setaro
title: Listen to Calvin Harris, Frank Ocean, and Migos "Slide" Into a New Collaboration
text:
Listen to Calvin Harris, Frank Ocean, and Migos "Slide" Into a New Collaboration By Shawn Setaro Shawn is the host of The Cipher , a critically acclaimed hip-hop podcast that conducts in-depth interviews with the genre’s most interesting and important figures. He is a regular contributor at Forbes .
Shawn is also the former editor-in-chief of Rap Genius, and has written about music and culture for The Atlantic, Vibe, The Source, GQ, Esquire, The Sondheim Review, and more. 

Feb 24, 2017 Share Tweet Image via Publicist Late last month, Calvin Harris shared snippets of an upcoming collaboration with Frank Ocean and Migos. Then on Tuesday, he announced details: the song is called "Slide" and, true to his promise on Twitter , he released detailed liner notes.
CALVIN HARRIS // FRANK OCEAN // MIGOS pic.twitter.com/ UvsJzm9F6k 
— Calvin Harris ( @CalvinHarris ) February 21, 2017 Now, you can finally hear the end result. "Slide" is available on iTunes and Apple Music .
It seems like the tune won't be the last we hear from the mercurial Ocean. John Mayer revealed on Thursday that he heard new music from the Blonde  singer, and that it sounded like "space reggae, future reggae." We can't wait.
Related Calvin Harris Spent Over $15 Million on This Beverly Hills Compound Calvin Harris' "18 Months" Goes Platinum Watch Calvin Harris' "Pray to God" Video f/ HAIM Tags: News , Calvin Harris , Frank Ocean , Migos , New Music
